title: Trishala Dutt:'Rest In Paradise'! Sanjay Dutt's Daughter Trishala Pens Heartbreaking Note On Late Boyfriend's Birthday
text:
There is nothing more painful than losing a loved one. It was in July 2019 that Sanjay Dutt’s daughter Tishala Dutt had revealed to the world that her boyfriend was no more.

Twitter

Without revealing his name, she had written, “My heart is broken. Thank You for loving me, protecting me, and taking care of me. You have made me the happiest I’ve ever been in my life. I’m the luckiest girl in the world to have met you and beyond blessed to have been yours. You will live in me for eternity. I love you and I will miss you. Until we meet again. Forever yours, xo your Bella Mia,” she wrote.

instagram/trishaladutt

Today, on his birthday, Trishala got emotional yet again. Dedicating a post on Instagram to him, she shared a heart-touching photo of two of them together. In the caption, she wrote, “Not a day, not a second, not a moment goes by where I don’t think about you. Happy Birthday. Rest In Paradise. I love you. Love, Bella Mia.”

Ever since Trishala Dutt’s boyfriend passed away, she has been sharing emotional posts. In one of the posts she had revealed about the most romantic thing he did for her. Here it is.

Instagram

In another post, she had revealed that it was tough for her to get back to normal life after this tragic incident. “It took every fiber in my being to pick myself up, get ready, smile, & attend a phenomenal wedding this weekend of one of my closest friends beautiful sister. These few weeks have been excruciating for me but I’m doing my best to be okay. I miss him SO much I love him so much. He adored me just as much as I adored him,” she wrote.

Instagram

Trishala Dutt is Sanjay Dutt’s eldest child with wife Richa Sharma, who died of brain tumour within two year her marriage with the star.
